welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rumst, a charming city known for its picturesque scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and soak up its unique beauty during your stay. Enjoy your time in Rumst!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
